Docs.summary: Parsing utilities for converting between transform column argument objects and command line representations.

Docs.summary: For parsing name and source from a string. This supports "name" and "name:source".

static bool TryParse(std::wstring const & str, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] std::wstring const & & name, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] std::wstring const & & source, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] std::wstring const & & extra);

Docs.summary: For parsing name and source from a string. This supports "name" and "name:source" and "name:extra:source". For the last form, the out extra parameter is set accordingly. For the other forms, extra is set to null.
